message: Just finished the site and want to know what you think. http://www.pubbsoft.com - I want to see if the site makes it clear what I'm doing here, so I'll wait to explain EXACTLY what the site is/does.
Nice. You might want to start tweaking the UI later.
The design isn't bad but the conditions are scary ! 150$ for publishing on the AppStore ?
i bet there's a market for this product though
@pubbsoft if you have to write "Click a question, get a response...", you're doing it wrong
(1) UI should be self-explanatory, (2) links should be underlined, and (3) clicks should be minimized -- don't make me expand all the answers
also, I think the copy is deceptive -- it says free, but it's not free
Are you having issues with the video? I've tried to work the kinks out there.
@aminho Right. The value proposition is that it would take hours and hours, plus objective C knowledge skill to do it otherwise. Any thoughts on that? Do you see another viable model?
@andrewbadr Good point. I think it is self explanatory. I'll delete that.
@andrewbadr About the clicking...I had complaints about "scrolling" before. Thats why I did the accordion style FAQ. ugh!
